amendment.description: The end of title I, add the following: SEC. __. CORPS LEVEES THAT AFFECT COMMUNITY-OWNED LEVEES. Where Federally owned and operated levees increase flood risk and compromise the accreditation of community-owned local flood protection systems, it shall be the policy of the Corps of Engineers to act expeditiously with actions required to authorize, fund, identify, and implement improvements to reduce and negate negative impacts to community-owned flood protection system accreditation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (IA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (IA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Young (IA).
